message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. If you buy it, I'll give you a 90-day warranty and a 100% satisfaction guarantee. I'm confident you'll find it meets your needs.
Sounds great! I'll take it. Thanks for the warranty and guarantee, I appreciate that.

I'm glad you liked the first product! Unfortunately, this one is a different story. I want to be transparent with you, and I'll be honest - this product is not up to our usual standards. I'm offering it to you for $10000, but I'm willing to throw in a free upgrade to a similar product if you buy it. This way, you can get a better experience and still get a good deal.
Thank you for your honesty, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'd rather wait for a product that meets your usual standards.

This way, you can take a risk-free shot at getting a good deal.

If you're willing to take a chance on us, I'll throw in the full refund, credit, and gift card offer from before, plus an additional $500 credit towards any future purchase.
